text: I Dream of Jeannie is an American fantasy sitcom. It stars Barbara Eden as a 2,000-year-old genie and Larry Hagman as an astronaut who becomes her master. They fall in love and later get married. It is produced by Screen Gems. It also stars Bill Daily and Hayden Rorke. The show originally aired from September 18, 1965 to May 26, 1970 with new episodes, and through September 1970 with season repeats, on NBC. The show ran for five seasons and produced 139 episodes. ==Other websites== * Barbara "Jeannie" Eden's Official Website * TV Land buys back the rights to I Dream of Jeannie * Category:1965 television series debuts Category:1970 television series endings Category:American fantasy television series Category:American sitcoms Category:NBC network series Category:1970s American television series endings
title: I Dream of Jeannie
